ygData.subject: A good idea, Dark Elves especially please read.
ygData.msgSnippet: I saw a good idea posted on the eqvault board regarding Paladins who do the knight of truth quest getting a sir added to there name.  I typed feedback for
ygData.messageBody:
I saw a good idea posted on the eqvault board regarding Paladins who do the
knight of truth quest getting a sir added to there name. I typed feedback
for this, since I think its a good idea.

It then occurred to me, why cant Dark Elf warriors get a similar title. Why
cant we get Dragoon added to our names when we hit level 45 (or whatever
level the Dragoons are). Either get it automatically, IF we want it or
perform a quest to get it.

I already wrote feedback on this, if anyone else thinks its a good idea,
could I ask you all to write some feed back :) ?

thanks.
